alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Henry; Jefferson; Lee; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Van Buren; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 9:34AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois and east central and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Des Moines; Henry; Jefferson; Lee; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Van Buren; Washington
